text: Charles Brinkley Morton (senior; January 6, 1926 - July 13, 1994) was second bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of San Diego. Born in Meridian, Mississippi, he was a graduate of the University of Mississippi and Sewanee: The University of the South. He served as Bishop of San Diego from 1982 to 1992. == See also == *List of bishops of the Episcopal Church in the United States of America == External links == *Morton Elected Bishop in San Diego *Episcopal Bishop Morton Announces Early Retirement Category:1926 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Bishops of the Episcopal Church in the United States of America Category:American Episcopal priests Category:People from Meridian, Mississippi Category:Sewanee: The University of the South alumni Category:Place of birth missing Category:People from San Diego
title: C. Brinkley Morton
